text: And the Jews said: "Ezra (is) God`s son", and the Christians , said: "The Messiah, (is) God`s son." That (is) their saying/word/opinion and belief with their mouths, they equal/resemble (the) saying/word/opinion and belief (of) those who disbelieved from before, God fought/killed them, how (do) they be lied to/be turned away
